Lecture 15: Attitudes about Gossip in Early China and Middle Egyptian
2024/1/19│16:00–17:30
Dr Adam SCHWARTZ
Associate Professor, Department of Chinese Language and Literature,
Hong Kong Baptist University

- Abstract: This lecture shall make a comparative case study on attitudes about gossip from Early Chinese (Book of Songs “On the Wall There is Tribulus”) and Middle Egyptian (Teachings of Ptah-hotep) literary sources with a focus on wordplay and scribal agency.
- Language: English
- Venue: SWT 702, Level 7, Shaw Tower, Hong Kong Baptist University
